statements: SELECT * FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, waste_level FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location_id FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE waste_level < 50
SELECT sensor_type, location_id FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-15 08:00:00'
SELECT * FROM water_waste_warnings ORDER BY waste_level ASC, timestamp
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location_id, waste_level, timestamp FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE waste_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY waste_level ASC
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(waste_level) AS average_waste_level FROM water_waste_warnings GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(waste_level) > 30 ORDER BY average_waste_level DESC
SELECT location_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE sensor_type = 'temp_sensor' GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY sensor_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM water_waste_warnings WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%pressure%' ORDER BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT id, sensor_id, water_flow_rate FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT * FROM WaterWasteWarnings WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT id, timestamp, warning_message FROM WaterWasteWarnings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(water_flow_rate) FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(water_flow_rate) FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT MAX(water_flow_rate), sensor_id FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY MAX(water_flow_rate) DESC
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, warning_message FROM WaterWasteWarnings LEFT JOIN WaterUsageData ON WaterWasteWarnings.sensor_id = WaterUsageData.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption;
SELECT id, timestamp, flow_rate FROM WaterConsumption WHERE usage_status = TRUE;
SELECT location, SUM(flow_rate) AS total_flow FROM WaterConsumption GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM WarningLog WHERE warning_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, email, notification_preference FROM AlertRecipient WHERE location_interest = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, location FROM WaterConsumption WHERE flow_rate > 5 AND usage_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT location, count(*) FROM WaterConsumption GROUP BY location HAVING count(*) > 100 ORDER BY count(*) DESC;

SELECT w.id, w.timestamp, w.location, a.warning_type, a.warning_message FROM WaterConsumption w INNER JOIN WarningLog a ON w.location = a.location WHERE a.warning_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY w.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ar.email, ar.phone_number, ar.location_interest, wl.timestamp, wl.warning_type FROM AlertRecipient ar LEFT JOIN WarningLog wl ON ar.location_interest = wl.location WHERE wl.warning_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY wl.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM warnings;
SELECT location, water_flow_rate FROM warnings WHERE water_flow_rate > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT ah.alert_id, ah.alert_timestamp, w.location FROM alert_history ah LEFT JOIN warnings w ON ah.warning_id = w.warning_id;
SELECT * FROM warnings WHERE water_flow_rate > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, water_flow_rate FROM warnings WHERE location = 'Mansion' AND water_flow_rate < 5;
SELECT users.username, sensors.location FROM users JOIN sensors ON users.user_id = sensors.sensor_id;
SELECT MIN(water_flow_rate) AS min_flow_rate, MAX(water_flow_rate) AS max_flow_rate FROM warnings;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_warnings FROM warnings;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, water_usage FROM WaterUsage WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT id, water_usage, device_id, timestamp FROM WaterUsage WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT device_id, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM WaterUsage GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp, water_usage FROM WaterUsage WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE device_id = 10 AND water_usage < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, timestamp FROM WaterUsage WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT device_id, AVG(water_usage) AS avg_usage FROM WaterUsage GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(water_usage) > 75
SELECT device_id, MAX(water_usage) AS max_usage FROM WaterUsage GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY max_usage DESC LIMIT 3
